metadata.title: CVE-2018-17572 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
InfluxDB 0.9.5 has Reflected XSS in the Write Data module.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17572` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

influxdb - 1.1.1+dfsg1-4
influxdb-client - 1.1.1+dfsg1-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: influxdb package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.1+dfsg1-4').
